com.github.mmichaelis.hamcrest.nextdeed.concurrent

Interface WaitTimeoutEvent<T,R>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WaitTimeoutEventImpl

    public interface WaitTimeoutEvent<T,R>
    Event when a WaitFunction times out.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String describe()
      Describe the timeout.
      long getConsumedMs()
      Get the consumed milliseconds before the timeout occurred.
      T getItem()
      Get item the delegate function got applied to.
      R getLastResult()
      Get the last evaluated result which did not match the given predicate.
      WaitFunction<T,R> getSource()
      Get the source of the timeout event.

    • Method Detail

        @NotNull
WaitFunction<T,R> getSource()
        Get the source of the timeout event.
        Returns:
        source

        Get the consumed milliseconds before the timeout occurred.

        Get item the delegate function got applied to.

        R getLastResult()
        Get the last evaluated result which did not match the given predicate.
        Returns:

      • describe

        @NotNull
String describe()
        Describe the timeout. Convenient for use in exception messages.
